mapper.sql: pkid, name, sex, age, address, phone, level, reason, capacity, policy
mapper.insert: insert into person (pkid, name, sex, age, address, phone, level, reason, capacity, policy) values (#{pkid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{capacity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{policy,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update person set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, level = #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reason = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, capacity = #{capacity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, policy = #{policy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where pkid = #{pkid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
